name: Plushie returns home
description:
A small two-man project for a soft plushie on its way to its best buddy. Nobody is allowed to notice that a plushie can walk, so move swift and quickly between the parent to the second floor where your buddy lies.

Sadly, we have a little bug with the shader on the main character, and it's really hard to lose. Still, it's the end of the jam, and we want to finish our little project.  I hope you enjoy the visuals and have fun. 

You are the favorite plushie of your child.
Unfortunately, they forgot you while you were playing with them outside.
Get back inside to the top floor but don't let their parents see you, they can't know that you are alive.
